section.title: Downloads
section.para: You need to download and install the necessary software packages. The links and versions are as of 09-Jan-2005.

listitem.simpara: Use the following link to download Microsoft Visual C++ Express version 2005:
listitem.note: Visual C++ Express can also be downloaded as an ISO CD image (463 MB) from the MSDN subscriber download site if you have a MSDN account. The download via the above link is very slow. The download size for the above link which is approximately 68 MB took several hours to download compared to less than an hour for the ISO MSDN download.

listitem.simpara: Click on the "Go!" button beside the Visual C++ 2005 Express Edition language selection.
